com.zebra.sdk.btleComm

Class BluetoothLeDiscoverer

  • Object
    • com.zebra.sdk.btleComm.BluetoothLeDiscoverer

  • public class BluetoothLeDiscoverer
extends Object
    A class that discovers Bluetooth® Low Energy devices.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void findPrinters(android.content.Context context, DiscoveryHandler discoveryHandler)
      Find Bluetooth® devices that are discoverable.
      Note: This method will return all Bluetooth® Low Energy Zebra printers.
      Note: This method should not be called from the application main thread.
      Note: Android 6 and higher (API 23+) requires user permission ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION in your application manifest.
      static void setDiscoveryTimeoutInterval(long mSec) 

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • findPrinters

        public static void findPrinters(android.content.Context context,
                DiscoveryHandler discoveryHandler)
                         throws ConnectionException
        Find Bluetooth® devices that are discoverable.
        Note: This method will return all Bluetooth® Low Energy Zebra printers.
        Note: This method should not be called from the application main thread.
        Note: Android 6 and higher (API 23+) requires user permission ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION in your application manifest.
        Parameters:
        context - Android™ application context.
        discoveryHandler - a com.zebra.sdk.printer.discovery.DiscoveryHandler instance that is used to handle discovery events (e.g. found a printer, errors, discovery finished).
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - for communication or discovery errors.

      • setDiscoveryTimeoutInterval

        public static void setDiscoveryTimeoutInterval(long mSec)
